tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE BiotechnologyLab (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE genes (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, function VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE proteins (protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, molecular_weight DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
    researcher_id UUID REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE Gene ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sequence TEXT NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) )
CREATE TABLE Protein ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sequence TEXT NOT NULL, function VARCHAR(100) )
CREATE TABLE DNA ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, sequence TEXT NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE GeneExpression ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT NOT NULL, level FLOAT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(id) )
CREATE TABLE Gene (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, gene_sequence TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Protein (protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, protein_sequence TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Experiment (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT NOT NULL, protein_id INT NOT NULL, result VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id), FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES Protein(protein_id))
CREATE TABLE Researcher (researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, affiliation VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Lab (lab_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lab_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, director_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (director_id) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id))
